title: Ebro In The Morning - Nikole Hannah-Jones of the 1619 Project
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Nikole Hannah-Jones is a Pulitzer Prize-winning reporter covering racial injustice for The New York Times Magazine and creator of the landmark 1619 Project. She joins Ebro In The Morning to talk about the 1619 Project Book. 

Subscribe to Ebro In The Morning today! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
